name: Catch me, if you can!
description:
This top-down, hide-and-seek-type game is based on a life of a terrified pet-hamster, called Dusty, who’s managed to escape its cage. The player controls the pet-hamster in order to hide from its owner, Tim, before the time runs out. The game sets place in different rooms of the house where the characters live. Dusty has to escape all rooms in the house to free itself completely, ergo with done that, wins the game.

Gameplay
